root.SourceConnectionString: Data Source = PC201506031349;Initial Catalog = DB3;Integrated Security = SSPI;
root.TargetConnectionString: Data Source = PC201506031349;Initial Catalog = CLZ;Integrated Security = SSPI;
root.SelectQuery: select dp.PRODUCT_SN,dp.PRODUCT_NAME,dpt.PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME from dbo.DIC_PRODUCT dp inner join dbo.DIC_PRODUCT_TYPE dpt on dp.PRODUCT_TYPE_ID=dpt.PRODUCT_TYPE_ID;
